info.name: Improf
info.description:
Improf made one assumption : everyone posses skills that someone else lack.
Improf is a platform for people to share their skills freely with the community.
The platform integrates in it's core the Zoom client and make available the scheduling of private meeting between members.
The platform is self moderated through reviews and credits, in order to benefit from a person formation service, one needs to have a positive balance of credits, credits that one can earn by sharing formation services with the community.

item.name: users

request.description:
Get user's informations by its id.
If user id match current authenticated user (JWT token presence in Authorization Header) the endpoint returns a user full profile.
Create a user account.

Get all users (pagination defaults to 10 and result set returned from endpoint contains link to following and previous page)
The endpoint allow content filtering by username, email, id.

Delete a users account. 
Authenticated user must match the id present in the url.
Authorization header is mandatory.

Update a user account.
Authenticated user must match the id present in the url.
Authorization header is mandatory.

item.description: Collection to perform CRUD operations for a user

item.name: sessions

request.description:
Perform a login operation by authenticating the user.
Generate a valid JWT token, default JWT token expiration claim is set to 48 hours.
JWT uid claim only contains user application id.

item.description: The collection allow user to be authenticated on the application by requesting a JWT token.

item.name: categories

request.description: Get all the categories.
Get a specific category by its id.

Create a category.
Authenticated user must have the admin role.
Authorization header is mandatory.

item.description: The collection allow user to perform CRUD operations on the related collection.

item.name: formations

request.description:
Get all the formations.
Pagination limit defaults to 10.
Filtering is enabled and lookup can be made using label, id, id_category, id_user

request.description:
Get a formation by its id.
If authorization header present and authenticated user matches formation owner or subscriber to formation the data set will contains private and sensitive information such as meetings and meetings passwords.

request.description:
Update a formation.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match formation owner.

Delete a formation.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match formation owner.
Create a formation.

item.description: The collection allow user to perform CRUD operations on the related collection.

item.name: schedules

request.description:
Update a schedule.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match formation owner.

Delete a schedule.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match formation owner.

Create a schedule for a given formation.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match formation owner.

item.description: The collection allow user to perform CUD operations on the related collection.

item.name: reviews

request.description:
Update a review.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match appointment owner.

Delete a review.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match appointment owner.

Create a review.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match appointment owner.

item.description: The collection allow user to perform CUD operations on the related collection.

item.name: appointments

request.description:
Delete an appointment.
Authorization header is mandatory and authenticated user must match appointment owner.

Create an appointment.
Authorization header is mandatory.
Authenticated user must have sufficient credit balance.
Schedule for the formation must exists and be future.

item.description: The collection allow a user to perform CUD operations on the related collection.

item.name: zooms

request.description: Process a user request to request an access token and a refresh token allowing the application to perform action on the behalf of the user on Zoom API.

item.description: The collection provides means for a user to interact with the Zoom API and schedule or delete a meeting.

request.description: Process a user request to request an access token allowing the application to perform action on the behalf of the user on Facebook API.

item.name: meetings

request.description:
Create a meeting.
Authorization header is mandatory.
Authenticated user must match formation owner.
Authenticated user must have registered Zoom API credentials by calling /zoom/authorize first.

Delete a meeting.
Authorization header is mandatory.
Authenticated user must match formation owner.
Authenticated user must have registered Zoom API credentials by calling /zoom/authorize first.

item.description: The collections provides means to perform CUD operations in order to manage meetings on the platform and Zoom API.
